original: Liden, Arvid, fd. landshövding o. ståth. på Kalmar slott, Kalmar, f. 16/ 11/81 i Holmedal, Värml. 1., av lantbr., riksd :man R. Andersson o. Anna Lidén. G. 12 m. Ester Lindén. Barn: Hans f. 16, adv., Oskarshamn, Ingrid 20. – Jur. utr. kand. i Upps. 07. Andre länsnot. i Skarab. 1.. 10, länsnot. I Blek. 1. 13, länsassessor 18, landssekr. i Norrb. 1. 23, i Västmanl. 1. 33, i Sthlms 1. 3’7, landshövd. i Kalmar 1. o. ståthåll. på Kalmar slott 38-47. Ordf. i länsarb :ndn i Kalmar 1. sed. 45, sekr. o. kamr. h. Blek. 1. landsting 14-23, stat. förlikn :man f. medl. i arb :tvister inom övre norra distr. 30-32, inom mell. distr. 3i5-37, särsk. förlikn :man, led. o. ordf. i förlikn :komm. led. av 35 års länsstyr :utr. o. av 38 års sakk. f. utredn. om vägväs. förstat!., ordf. bl. 42 års sakk. f. förstatl. av väghålln. m. fl. sakk:uppdr. GV:sJmt, Kmstk-NO. Lidén, Erik Bernhard, advokat. Mariestad, f. 6/10/87 i Ullervad, Skarab. 1., av folkskollär. Anders Peter L. o. Laura Magnusson. G. m. gymn:dir. Hedvig Johansson. Barn: Inga Britt f. 21, Karin 24. — Mog:ex. i Skara 07, jur. kand. i Upps. 14. E. o. not. i Göta hovr. 14, tingstjg. i Marks, Vedens o. Bollebygds doms. 14-16, aman. h. Gbgs stads drätselkamm. 16-17, förste rådman i Skara 17-22, ombudsman v. A-B Sv. Handelsbankens avd :centr. i Borås 22-39, sekr. h. Norra Skarab. läns kristidsstyr. &ed. 39, egen adv:-rör. i Borås 26-39, dito i Mariestad sed. 44. Ordf. i styr. f. A-B Svenson & Hagberg i Borås sed. 30. Hobbies: jakt, fiske, lantbruk. Lidén, Ester, ämnesiärarinna, Uddevalla, f. 25/8/88 i Holmedal, Värml. 1., av R. Andersson o. Anna Anders-son-Lidén. — Ex. v. priv. h. lär :ne-sem. i Sthim 11. Res. t. Tyskl. 12, Danm. 16 o. 17, Tyskl, Schweiz o. Ital. 21, Frankr., Span. o. Marocko 26, HoH. o. Belg. 27, Tjeckoslov., Österr., Ung. 31, Finl. o. Estl. 32, Ital. 37 o. 38. Lär. v. Uddevalla elem :lärov. f. fl. 11-30, ord. ämneslär. i geogr. o. matem. v. Uddevalla komm. flicksk. sed. 30. Lidén, Gunnar Knut 0’skar, leg. läkare, Lidköping, f. 9/1/18 i Borgstena, Älvsb. 1., av stat :insp. Knut L. o. Lisa Johansson. G. 43 m. Nina v. Meyburg. Barn: Marianne f. 45. — Stud:ex. i Borås 37, med. kand. i Sthlm 39, med. lic. i Sthlm 44. Stud:-res. t. Tyskl. 34, Engl. 36, Frankr. 39. Vik. läk. v. Karol. sjukh. öronklin. 45, und :läk. v. Lidköp. las. öronavd. sed. 46. PistolskytteSm. Lidén, Hans Arvid, jur. kand., Oskarshamn, f. 11/3/16 i Karlskrona av landshövd. Arvid L. o. Ester Lindén. G. 44 m. Ulla Geijer. Barn: Olof f. 46. — Stud:ex. i Luleå 32, jur. kand. i Sthim 38. Tingstjg. i Nordmarks doms. 38-41, prakt, jurist i Oskarshamn fr. 42. Sekr. i stads,fullm. fr. 47.
translated:
Liden, Arvid, former governor and constable of Kalmar Castle, Kalmar, born on November 16, 1881 in Holmedal, Värmland, the first child of farmer R. Andersson and Anna Lidén. Married to Ester Lindén since 1912. Children: Hans, born in 1916, lawyer, residing in Oskarshamn, Ingrid, born in 1920. Graduated with a Juris Utriusque Candidatus degree from Uppsala University in 1907. Assistant county clerk in Skaraborg County in 1910, county clerk in Blekinge County in 1913, county assessor in 1918, Secretary of State in Norrbotten County in 1923, in Västmanland County in 1933, and in Stockholm County from 1937. Governor of Kalmar County and constable of Kalmar Castle from 1938 to 1947. Chairman of the county labor board in Kalmar County since 1945, Secretary and treasurer of the county council in Blekinge County from 1914 to 1923, government-appointed mediator in labor disputes in the northern district from 1930 to 1932, in the central district from 1935 to 1937, and as a special government-appointed mediator. He was a member and chairman of the mediation committee and member of the county administrative board and an expert for investigations on road infrastructure. He was also chairman of the expert committee for road maintenance and held other expert assignments. Recipient of the Royal Order of the Polar Star and the Knight's Cross of the Order of the North Star. 

Lidén, Erik Bernhard, lawyer, Mariestad, born on October 6, 1887 in Ullervad, Skaraborg County, the child of primary school teacher Anders Peter Liden and Laura Magnusson. Married to Hedvig Johansson, a gymnasium director. Children: Inga Britt, born in 1921, Karin, born in 1924. Obtained a degree in teaching from Skara in 1907, and a Juris Utriusque Candidatus degree from Uppsala University in 1914. Became acting clerk in the Göta Court of Appeal in 1914, district court clerk in Marks, Vedens, and Bollebygds in 1914-1916, civil servant in Gothenburg's municipal finance department from 1916 to 1917, first judge in Skara from 1917 to 1922, representative of A-B Svenska Handelsbanken's central department in Borås from 1922 to 1939, secretary in the Northern Skaraborg County's crisis force in 1939, a self-employed lawyer in Borås from 1926 to 1939, and continued as a lawyer in Mariestad since 1944. Chairman of the board for A-B Svenson & Hagberg in Borås since 1930. Hobbies include hunting, fishing, and farming.

Lidén, Ester, subject teacher, Uddevalla, born on August 25, 1888 in Holmedal, Värmland, the child of R. Andersson and Anna Andersson-Lidén. Completed a private teacher training course in Stockholm in 1911. Traveled to Germany in 1912, Denmark in 1916 and 1917, Germany, Switzerland, and Italy in 1921, France, Spain, and Morocco in 1926, the Netherlands and Belgium in 1927, Czechoslovakia, Austria, and Hungary in 1931, Finland and Estonia in 1932, Italy in 1937 and 1938. Taught at Uddevalla elementary school from 1911 to 1930, and as a regular subject teacher in geography and mathematics at Uddevalla municipal girls' school since 1930.

Lidén, Gunnar Knut Oskar, licensed doctor, Lidköping, born on January 9, 1918 in Borgstena, Älvsborg County, the child of state inspector Knut Liden and Lisa Johansson. Married to Nina von Meyburg since 1943. Child: Marianne, born in 1945. Completed a secondary school examination in Borås in 1937, a medical degree in Stockholm in 1939, and a medical licentiate degree in Stockholm in 1944. Traveled to Germany in 1934, England in 1936, and France in 1939. Temporary physician at Karolinska Hospital's ear clinic in 1945, assistant physician at Lidköping Hospital's ear department since 1946. Participates in pistol shooting competitions.

Liden, Hans Arvid, Juris Utriusque Candidatus, Oskarshamn, born on March 11, 1916 in Karlskrona, the child of governor Arvid Liden and Ester Lindén. Married to Ulla Geijer since 1944. Child: Olof, born 1946. Completed a secondary school examination in Luleå in 1932, and a Juris Utriusque Candidatus degree in Stockholm in 1938. Served as district court clerk in Nordmark's district from 1938 to 1941, and has been practicing law in Oskarshamn since 1942. Secretary in the city council since 1947.

structured.name: Arvid Liden
structured.occupation: Former governor and constable of Kalmar Castle
honorificSuffix: Knight's Cross of the Order of the North Star
Royal Order of the Polar Star
